# Problem 2

```{r}
mr_trash_wheel = 
  read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-7-2020-2.xlsx", "Mr. Trash Wheel", range = "A2:N535") %>%
  clean_names(dat = .) %>%
  drop_na(data = ., dumpster) %>%
  mutate(trash_wheel = 1)
  
  
view(mr_trash_wheel)
```
